svg.text: R-L-C Individual AC Behavior & Phasor Analysis

g.text: S² = P² + Q², cos φ = P/S
• Resistor: V & I in phase → "ELI the ICE man"
Understanding AC behavior of R, L, C is fundamental to electrical engineering analysis
Essential for: Circuit Analysis | Power Systems | Filter Design | Impedance Matching | AC Motor Control
